casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
DANOVAN T. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 3, 2018

Richard Emanuel, in support of the petition.

Matthew A. Weiner, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn. App. 637, 170 A.3d 722 (2017), is denied.

MULLINS, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
